short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dreamer is a browser extension that allows you to generate new images from any image on the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dreamer allows you to use the Stability.ai Stable Diffusion API to directly perform image 2 image generation inside the browser. Simply right click on any image and choose "Dream from Image" and it will generate a new image in its likeness.  You can also guide it using text and select any text in a webpage and generate an image out of it.
